Html:
What does that mean?  I suppose I could create some test labels and play with this long enough to understand it but I was hoping someone could provide a link to documentation or just explain it.  What does it mean "in  a scope"?  I've heard it said that the scope includes workspace so that means multiple developers could create the same label name on the same code.  Is this correct?  This is actually how I hope this works. 

Thanks,

Dale

You may want to read this blog by one of the VS ALM Rangers:

http://teamfoundation.blogspot.com/2008/03/label-scope-revealed.html

Labels and label scope is a server-side concept. Workspaces are not included in scope. Creating two labels with the same name and scope will cause the second label to replace the first.

Regards,
Bill Heys
VS ALM Ranger

﻿﻿﻿

﻿

Thanks for the update and the link, Bill. It was very helpful.
Regards,
Dale
